functionality.name: Account Creation
functionality.description: A feature for users to create accounts with validation, multi-channel verification, differentiated onboarding flows, and security options.

requirements.description: The system must allow users to create an account by providing personal details.
The system must allow users to verify their email and phone numbers through a verification code sent via SMS, WhatsApp, or email.
The system must handle different types of accounts (e.g., personal and business).
The system must validate all required fields and provide feedback for missing or invalid inputs.
The system must store user consent for terms, conditions, and privacy policy acceptance.
The system must support two-factor authentication (2FA).
The system must allow users to input financial or demographic data for eligibility to specific benefits.

epics.description: Enable user account creation with validation and feedback mechanisms.

user_stories.description: As a user, I want to create an account by filling out a form with my personal or business details so I can access the app's features.

tasks.description: Design the UI for account creation forms, differentiating personal and business account types.
Implement backend validation for required fields and constraints.
Create frontend logic to display field validation errors dynamically.

user_stories.description: As a user, I want to receive immediate feedback when a required field is missing or incorrect to ensure I complete the form correctly.

epics.description: Provide multi-channel verification for user contact details.

user_stories.description: As a user, I want to verify my phone number through a code sent via SMS or WhatsApp for security purposes.

tasks.description: Design the UI for selecting verification methods (SMS, WhatsApp, or call).
Implement APIs for sending verification codes via multiple channels.
Create logic to validate and process entered verification codes.

user_stories.description: As a user, I want to verify my email address to finalize my account creation.

epics.description: Support differentiated onboarding flows for personal and business accounts.

user_stories.description: As a business user, I want to enter additional details (e.g., company name, tax ID) to ensure compliance with business requirements.

tasks.description: Add form fields specific to business accounts, including validation rules.

user_stories.description: As a personal user, I want a simpler onboarding form to save time and avoid unnecessary fields.

tasks.description: Simplify the personal account form by removing business-specific fields dynamically.

epics.description: Implement security features such as 2FA and consent recording.

user_stories.description: As a user, I want to enable two-factor authentication during account setup for enhanced security.

tasks.description: Implement 2FA activation logic during account creation.

user_stories.description: As a user, I want to confirm my consent to the terms and conditions before completing the account creation.

tasks.description: Design and display checkboxes for user consent agreements.
Store user consent information securely in the database.
